website_summaries.verdict: Everyone will love your personal-sized brownies and you'll love how easy the pan is to clean.
pros: Unique honeycomb shape makes 12 crispy edge brownies
The nonstick pan works well without additional cooking spray
Brownies pop out of pan easily when flipped upside down
cons: Brownies tend to bake faster than suggested cooking times in this pan

customer_reviews.title: BEST PAN EVER! For real
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before. If you need a brownie pan this is hands down the one to purchase! I have been baking brownies for over 25 years! I've searched every where for a brownie pan. This is the best! It does not stick you get 12 perfectly sized brownies in 30 minutes! If I could give it 10 stars I would. I'm actually ordering another so I can bake 2 batches at once! Thanks so much for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made for 9x13 mixes...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best edge-brownie pan. One comment though... If you are thinking of getting this and just using smaller box mixes for an 8x8 pan you might want to look around and read some of the feedback here. It's possible it will work with 2 of those but it's likely that it will overflow. It's made for 9x13 batches - which it does excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Coward

customer_reviews.title: Chewy, crispy edges with fudgy centers - easy to remove from pan!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - very pleased with my first batch of brownies! Fudgy brownie centers with chewy edges. Not difficult to remove from the pan at all. I greased with just a dollop of vegetable oil. Once the brownies were done, I loosened the corners with just my finger and then turned the pan upside down to remove the brownies. I wasn’t sure how the shape would look once cut, but it actually looks pretty uniform. Would highly recommend this as an alternative to the other more well-known brownie pan. This also gives more edges! Reminder to adjust baking temperature and time as this is a dark coated pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Edge lover seeking Edges
customer_reviews.text: If you love crunchy, chocolaty brownie edges, this pan will provide you with nonstop brownie pleasure. It is the best pan in existence. This pan gives you 12, perfectly edgy brownies on all sides. You will not be displeased.
customer_reviews.author: Kell_Phx

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool :)
customer_reviews.text: I like brownies, haha. Everyone likes the corners, and this pan is fantastic. It's thick, not flimsy at all. There is a nice non stick coat on it. The design is nice too, with the holes in it to gather heat and make this nice crispy edges. Very cool indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Thailand

customer_reviews.title: Works like you think. Just give it a couple of test runs
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I like brownie edges, it's my favorite part of the brownie. Some people do, some don't. So I got this! You spray this down real good with non stick spray (don't skip this step), bake your brownies to your desired texture (35 m in my toaster oven @ 325), remove and let cool, flip upside down and smack it into the counter (be firm but not violent!). Bam lots o edge! Just try it out and dial in your desired texture and don't skip the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Good pan but needs extra cleaning after use
customer_reviews.text: The pan makes great brownies and they’re all evenly sized without cutting. Be sure to spray the pan well when baking using it. The inside diamonds can be really difficult to clean by hand. The brownies I’ve made using this pan have always been delicious - lots of corners to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Gino C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made but others are much better.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced this with a much less expensive brownie pan with individual openings for brownies. Also use the replacement pan for individual cornbread pieces. I really did not like this pan and gave it away at a gift swap.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A.

customer_reviews.title: Love all the "corners"
customer_reviews.text: My son cooked brownies for Thanksgiving in this pan and I was impresses. It was easy to fill and evenly distributed and cooked perfectly..and not to mention all the pieces were crunchy corners..Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ER_RN

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan.  Perfect brownies
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pan. Brownies baked perfect. They popped right out of pan and the edges on all the brownies are perfect and delicious. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dea Scura

customer_reviews.title: Brownies
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan because you can add lots of walnuts and the sides of the pan are high enough for this.
customer_reviews.author: Minnette

customer_reviews.title: You are so square
customer_reviews.text: looks awesome cannot wait to use for my homemade special brownies
customer_reviews.author: Louis & Quynh

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! My husband and I used to fight over the edges and corners when I would make brownies and now we don't have to. It's easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean, perfect edge brownies were enjoyed by all!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is super easy to use. I made sure to grease it with crisco before I poured my brownie batter in so my brownies came out very easily and all were cooked evenly. I would recommend cooking about 5 minutes less than instructed because there are more edges. The pan was easy to clean also. Just make sure someone with a steady hand pours the batter in so it doesn’t spill.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Was used a many of times. Our family fights for corners. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo

customer_reviews.title: Need to cut down baking time. I over cooked ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to cut down baking time. I over cooked but they still removed from pan ok. Get a plastic spatula if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Bakelicious
customer_reviews.text: This pan makes great brownies. I used spray and gently pull all the edges away from the pan before flipping it over to remove the brownies and it works great. Holds one box of box mix and makes great chewy brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Zacc Kernper

customer_reviews.title: Every brownie was corners
customer_reviews.text: Love this CB pan... Anyone who loves brownies will love it...
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT NONSTICK
customer_reviews.text: Cheap pan made in china and IT IS NOT NONSTICK but you get what you pay for from a random "dudeiwantthat" website
customer_reviews.author: Mindd Sprayy

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love brownie edges!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! If you are one who loves the edges of brownies, and who doesn’t, this is it!!!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass this one up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Over all the best pan I have ever purchased. Have told everyone about it Great 5 plus star’s
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: brownies
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan for brownies and also pineapple upside down cake and it is awesome to clean
customer_reviews.author: Tereasa

customer_reviews.title: The thing that I don't like about this pan is that the brownies are not ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing that I don't like about this pan is that the brownies are not particularly attractive. They have to be cut to be separated from one another so there is an unfinished spot on each brownie.
customer_reviews.author: dallasdeb52

customer_reviews.title: Delicious brownies
customer_reviews.text: Makes delicious brownies. No more fighting for an edge piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chad V/Vanessa V

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but this thing is awesome! I followed the instructions it came with. Sprayed the pan well and I used one box of Betty Crocker brownie mix cooked at 350 for 20 minutes. Let them cool and They came out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Brownie's corners must have
customer_reviews.text: This pan is a must for any person who loves brownie's corners. It is a wonderful kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Borda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really get our brownies as crispy as we would want it, but it's OK
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kage

customer_reviews.title: Great brownie pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brownie pan I've ever used. If you take the time to prep it before adding the batter and you give the brownies sufficient time to cool, they come out in one piece. Lots of crispy edges.
customer_reviews.author: kidzrgr8t

customer_reviews.title: Love the pan
customer_reviews.text: Love the pan! Does exactly what it says it will do. I love edges only. We use it for brownies and cornbread
customer_reviews.author: Hjm726

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved not having to fight over a getting a corner piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Reduce package cook time by 2 - 3 minutes, brownies were perfection.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Scrumptious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size brownies with crispy edges all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Hoo5633

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My son asked for this for his birthday because he loves the "corner brownies". I recommend using the "family size" brownie mix that would go in a 9x13 pan. The 8x8 wouldn't be enough batter. Spray well with oil on each part of the pan. I baked at 350 for 30 minutes & that was enough time (your oven may be different). It left every edge perfect, the inside still nice and fudge-y & the brownies came out of the pan with no problems. I absolutely recommend this if you're a love of edges. Washing it isn't exactly fun because of all the crevices, but oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Makes great 4 corner crispy brownies. Very well made pan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: We love it and I wish I had bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan several times a month. I have let neighbors borrow it. We love it and I wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: better yet four edges
customer_reviews.text: Brownies with an edge, better yet four edges. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: mcb1180

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I purchased 2 additional ones for my mom and sister. Its a little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for making extra edges, but grease well so brownies come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Russell H

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Take that "other" brownie pan out of your cart and buy this one! Best brownie pan ever!! Wish I'd been baking brownies with this for 40+ years! Turn out amazing (and I hate the word "amazing").
customer_reviews.author: brok

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept. Non-stick not so Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pan for brownies/blondies. Unfortunately they stick to the pan and are difficult to remove without the brownies/blondies breaking apart! I have tried greasing the pan with Pam and shortening...they still stick.
customer_reviews.author: bennyg

customer_reviews.title: Godd pan
customer_reviews.text: My son turned me on to this kind of pan, and I couldn't be more pleased. The quality of this pan is good and it arrived on time and well-packaged, so I'd be happy to visit this merchant again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my dad. He says it doesnt quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad. He says it doesnt quite make the "corner texture" he likes on the regular brownie pan. I suggested maybe he should "overbake" it according to the recipe to allow the "inside corners" to get that texture.
customer_reviews.author: JS 369

customer_reviews.title: A Brownies Lovers Dream Come True!
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why you are looking at this pan--right? You like the way the edge or corners of brownies taste when compared to the softer interior portion. Well, you are not going to find a better pan for making individual brownies with four deliciously done edges/corners. This pan works!!! Buy it!!! Well worth the price!!! Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: jif5450

customer_reviews.title: For those of us...
customer_reviews.text: ... who like crispy edges on our brownies, this pan is a must! I thought it was a joke when I first saw it, but every time I looked at it on my wish list, the temptation grew. I finally ordered it, and made brownies. It worked like a charm. Perfectly crispy edges, and lots of them! I really like this pan, and will look forward to using it for cornbread.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Husband been wanting “all edges” brownies forever and when I saw this pan I took a chance. Glad I did! I am not a crust lover for my brownies typically I like center pieces but this unique and sturdy /well made pan definitely made a believer out of me. Priced right- I gave less than &20 for it. All I am saying is this is a winner!0
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: So not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Even with loads of greasing with butter or spray, brownies diff to remove. Most corners are not crispy. Areas of the pan that make the “inside” corners have a tiny indentation that’s impossible to clean. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: snoopydance4me

customer_reviews.title: Brownies came out great, with a nice edge all around!
customer_reviews.text: I made a batch today and really liked the edges all around on my brownies. I found it a little difficult to pour the batter in around the pan, you have to be careful not to make a mess. Other than that, it worked fine and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Duong

customer_reviews.title: Great brownie pan idea
customer_reviews.text: Makes larger brownies that have great edges. Let cool...then flip over on wax or parchement paper and cut apart easily making perfect size brownies that you can frost, or eat as is! I do recommend non-stick spray to ease release even more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BROWNIE PAN EVER
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with this product! Cooks every single brownie evenly from all sides. WARNING: MAY LEAD TO EATING TOO MANY BROWNIES!
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday gift from my Brownie eating Son
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this pan...We no longer have to fight for a corner when we make brownies.. At first i was worried how to get the batter in the pan without making a mess but after a few times it's easy...They never stick in the pan and clean up is so easy....This pan is a MUST if your family loves to eat the corners!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not much info
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good idea, but I wished it came with more instructions - how to adapt baking times for various recipes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cheapskate

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves brownies with the baked edges for a little crunch. This pan delivers! Easy to fill, bakes like a regular cake pan, cleans with soapy water with no scrubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product for edge lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who loves the corner pieces of the brownies. This makes every piece have 4 corners and he is so thrilled. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and it was very well received. Great quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CristalBlue

customer_reviews.title: My mom fell in love with it and has been wanting one and I ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought one of these years ago when they were still at Bed bath and beyond. i use it for mini cornbreads, brownies, cakes, ect... My mom fell in love with it and has been wanting one and I couldnt find them. But i did find it on amazon and got her one for christmas. She cant wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: jccox0911

customer_reviews.title: 4 corners/edges on each brownie!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have baked brownies, cornbread, and cake in this awesome pan!!! My family and friends enjoyed the goods!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Delivers as promised. Just watch the baking time because a regular box mix baked quicker than the directions for a 9 x 13 cake pan
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Brownies
customer_reviews.text: Love the edge of brownies and this pan gives you more edges to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Nice brownie pan. Bought as a gift. Nice and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: NeoNurse

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL - highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL - makes great brownies, crisp sides on each brownie, makes 12 brownies. Cooks evenly and doesn't take as long as the box says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Tarab

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will recognise YOUR brownies!
customer_reviews.text: Be the hit of every bake sale! Charge double for these goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for Fluffy Pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pan for a recipe called Fluffy Pancakes and it turns the batter into mini ladles, cradling the syrup in the well. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love corners of brownies so love this pan. Have to grease all corners so brownies come out well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Brownies
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and taste of all the edges Pain in the neck to get out of the container
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I ruined the one I had bought originally and couldn't find a replacement anywhere. This was it, in the original box, brand new. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Cat B.

customer_reviews.title: Family likes more edges, this fit the bill. ...
customer_reviews.text: Family likes more edges, this fit the bill. Unique design. Used a 9x9 mix and wish I had used a 19x12 family size mix.
customer_reviews.author: trying new things

product_meta.title: Bakelicious Crispy Corner Brownie Pan, 10.5 x 13.63 x 1.5 inches
product_meta.description: Do you ever wish your brownies had more crispy edges? The crispy corner pan ensures that each brownie you bake has four crispy sides! Made of durable carbon steel, this pan features a convenient PFOA/PFTE-free non-stick coating to help with removal and cleaning - hand washing recommended to keep your pan looking and functioning like new. After baking and cooling, simply flip the pan and gently Tap to release the brownies. Pull apart for twelve deliciously crispy confections! Because the pan separates the brownie batter, brownies may cook faster than when baked in a traditional style pan. During first use, periodically check for doneness by inserting a cake Tester or toothpick during baking. When the cake Tester comes out clean, your brownies are done! This would be your ideal baking time when using the crispy corners pan.
feature_bullets: CRISPY EDGES Stop fighting 0ver the Corner Brownies
48 EDGES in this pan compared to only 14 in a normal brownie pan
PATENTED POSTS Insure pan heats up evenly for perfect baking and crispy brownie edges every time, no half-baked brownies anymore
HIGH QUALITY Non-Stick Coating IS PFOA/PFTE-free and allows for Easy-Release!
KIDS WILL LOVE this pan and the crispy edges and chocolatey goodness on the inside

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
